metadata.title: CVE-2021-47600 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: dmbtree remove: fix use after free in rebalance_children() Movedm_tm_unlock() after dm_tm_dec().

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
